header.name: Sergiy Misyuk
header.summary: I am a junior react developer, I am interested in various technologies and libraries, I am studying English. At the moment, I really like the frontend, so I devote a lot of time to it. I want to work in a team and further improve my experience.

one.title: Crossfit trainer - MKCF Sport Club
one.firstListItem: Working with clients, identifying their needs
one.partTwo: for monitoring client visits and payment accounting. Made an automatic service
one.partThree: to congratulate clients on their birthday, which improved their loyalty to the club.

two.title: Sales manager Landtech LLC
two.firstListItem: Communicating with clients and identifying their needs
two.secondListItem: Studied of technical documentation and courses
two.thirdListItem: Analytics of orders and creating a warehouse of goods
two.partOne: Achievement: was one of the best managers of the department. Also trained new employees to increase the company's network and profit.

three.title: Frontend Developer - Baza Trainee Ukraine (Part-time)
three.secondListItem: Communication with the client on his tasks
three.thirdListItem: Project support after production. Functionality update.
three.partOne: Achievement: in the absence of the project manager, organized communication in the middle of the team between developers, testers and designers.

one.title: Telegram bot
one.subTitle: - service with web app for send announcement in channel
one.used: Used: React js, hooks, router, form, yup, emotion, mixins, axios, firebase, node, express, cors, telegram api, liqpay, google cloud platform...

two.title: Warehouse
two.subTitle: mobile app for control stock balances
two.desc: I joined the project when the existing mobile version of the warehouse application was rewritten to the size of a tablet and increased functionality. Made tables, drop-down lists, product window

three.title: Photo social net
three.subTitle: mobile app for publish photos and messages
three.used: Used: React Native, Expo, Redux, location, camera, Firebase

four.title: SoYummy
four.subTitle: Full stack project. Cookbook with recipes and shopping lists
four.used: Used: React, hooks, react-redux, react-router-dom, portal, lazy, reduxpersist, formik, emotion/styled, yup, prop-types, toastify, paginate, node, express, mongodb, mongoose, cloudinary, swagger....
four.desc: Team project. My role - team lead. Creation of project architecture. On the node, I wrote the search route by title and ingredient, and also helped write database queries for others. Swager wrote part of the documentation. On React, I made a 'popular recipes' section, helped colleagues in different sections. Fixed bugs throughout the project. I deployed the application.

five.title: Filmoteka
five.subTitle: Site for search films, read details, watch trailer video
five.used: Used: JavaScript, Rest.API, axios, async/await, npm, firebase, SASS, HTML
five.desc: Team project. My role - team lead. Creation of project architecture. Layout and stylization of the header. Analysis of API documentation. Writing a film library class. Work with image quality. Bug fixes.

six.title: Icecream
six.subTitle: Site for sales products
six.used: Used: HTML, SASS, Java Script, JQuery
six.desc: Team project. My role - team lead. Creation of project architecture. Helping the team with their questions. Bug fixes.

seven.title: Status ac
seven.subTitle: - site for a lawyer company.
seven.used: Used: react js, axios, api, i18next, react hook form, yup, styled components, VPS
seven.desc: Team project. My role - team leader of frontend developers. Created frontend architecture. Support customer after production deploy product. Fix hidden bugs, write new features. Add meta pixel actions. Deploy code to vps. Clear old indexes pages from google search console.

eight.title: Posts API
eight.subTitle: - API for publish posts and books for sale
eight.used: Used: node js, express, SQLite, JWT, Swagger, AWS EC2, AWS Route 53, html+scss+js
eight.desc: Worked alone. Made protected and open routes, authorization, connect SQLite. The API has several entities that are logically united. Written swagger documentation and detailed info HTML page. Hosting on an Amazon server, file storage in a separate bucket

nine.title: Use prosto
nine.subTitle: - site with CMS for lawyer company.
nine.used: Used: react js, firebase, google cloud, redux, styled components, i18next, react hook form
nine.desc: Team project. My role head of project, designed CMS (react js), write some admin pages, fix bugs. Deploy to firebase hosting, write firebase function for reserve copy database to google cloud bucket, set up transfer job for reserve copy files to other bucket.

ten.title: Furycomics
ten.subTitle: - site with CMS for sale comix book and read online
ten.used: Used: react js, firebase, redux, styled components, i18next, react hook form, stripe, react-pdf, slick-carousel...
ten.desc: Team project. My role head of project, designed CMS (react js), wrote most of the code, fix bugs. The functional sale of goods has been wrote. An interface for online reading has been developed. Ð rinting PDF documents of the order. Deploy to firebase hosting.
